"me and my genius plan" yea, sure, mate. y'know your gf's feeling good with your friends cock and you also know that you agreed to "cheating" as long as they reported. so, what do you think would happen if you pretend to forget your gf's birthday? the idea of a surprise is good as long as you know that there's nowhere she can go if you let her down. that's why friends who do "comforting" (unless they are the same sex) is like an unwritten rule not to have one. welp, anyways, all's good since she didn't left her bf and went to the cuck's side. but the pretend game is still up so who knows how many times they'd do it and how many times she'll feel good. i wouldn't feel good if i were in the same situation but I'm not here to kink shame

Usually I would have been elated seeing a multi work series NTR and a consensual one at that. The story was great, but the art was a complete letdown. If I didn't saw the upload date I would have assumed this was an old doujin made 6 years ago. TLDR: great doujin but art is disappointing. 4.5/10

And of course we have the stereotypical blissfully ignorant self-insert cuck that doesn't recognize moans of pleasure and doesn't see a million red flags when the girlfriend says that he would hate her if he watched the recording, literally confessing that she is guilty of something that he wouldn't like.

So, that's it? No conclusion? This girl cheated on her boyfriend because she thought he forgot about her birthday, trusted Kudou when he LIED about Shougo's surprise, allowed herself to be filmed, and even said that she loved Kudou multiple times. So we're supposed to believe that, even after learning the truth, she doesn't regret anything, doesn't face any consequences, doesn't tell Shougo what happened (the full story), and we don't even get to see how the whole birthday conflict ended. Cool.
